action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A collection of geometric shapes including plus signs, rectangles, and triangles in purple, green, orange, and pink.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a series of geometric shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The shapes include four red squares, two purple squares, and three yellow and one orange rectangles. The red squares are positioned in the upper left corner and the upper right corner of the image. The purple squares are located in the upper right corner and the lower right corner of the image. The yellow rectangles are positioned in the lower left corner and the lower middle of the image. The orange rectangle is located in the lower middle of the image.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A collection of geometric shapes including plus signs, rectangles, and triangles in purple, green, orange, and pink.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any triangles present in the image?

ANSWER: No.
